title: Pixel 3a XL, does not make sound, Checked DND, Airplane, Volume, vibrate. (reset safe mde; no avail
content: Pixel 3a XL suddenly is silent and only vibrates.  I checked DND, airplane, volume levels, and that setting for "shortcut to prevent ringing" it's also off.  when i go into sounds -to change ringtone, those are also silent when you peruse the choices.   I reset in safe mode to disable all apps...still is not ringing, so that's not the issue.  Recently updated and scanned for issues.  whaaaat....is happening?  thank you in advance.
